UwU

example:
```py
from ab5 import vgratient

logo = '''
   __  __         __  __
  / / / /      __/ / / /
 / / / / | /| / / / / / 
/ /_/ /| |/ |/ / /_/ /  
\____/ |__/|__/\____/   
                        '''

print(vgratient(logo,[0,223,50],[0,25,222]))
```
